org.gvsig.raster.fmap.legend

Class ImageLegend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.fmap.legend.ImageLegend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, IHasImageLegend, ILegend, IRasterLegend, Persistent

    public class ImageLegend
extends Object
implements IRasterLegend, IHasImageLegend
    This object is for rasters which returns its legend as a image
